text: Bottle @ Home. Pours golden, no head, some light lacings. Aroma of sweet apples, light tart apples, wood, little alcohol. Flavor is sweet, light tart, rich apples, wood, sweet dessert wine, little alcohol. Medium to full body, oily mouthfeel, soft carbonation, sweet and light tart finish with warming alcohol. 7-2-8-5-17. 190617
Bottle at Johns. Pours pale amber with no head. Aroma of apple, honey, vanilla and pear. Toward heavy sweetness, touch of sour. Medium body, sticky texture, no carbonation.
Bottle. Dark yellow colour. Powerfull nice apple aroma. Heavy swet strong apple flavor. Barrel nicely present. Long great finish. Creamy palate.
Bottle @ Højbjerg tasting. No head. Color is golden. Aroma and taste are rich apples, little wood, some alcohol and has a nice warming finish. Lovely and slightly acidic.
Bottle 2013, 11%. Clear golden with no head. Aroma is apple, fruit, rich, complex and a little apple peel. Flavour is apples, fruit, rich, complex, sugar and apple peel.
Bottle thanks to BenH! Pours clear amber with no head. Aroma is intense apple. Taste is intense apple sweet, honey sweet, a hint of vanilla, very little tartness. Syrupy body.

Bottle from Holm Cider. Clear golden without head. Aroma is sweet apples, tart apples and wood. Flavor is very sweet and moderate acidic. Dry and moderate acidic finish with warming alcohol. Oily and soft. 311216

Wee Bottle from web SBcons 2016-12-28 Göteborg 
AR:apple skin, mix of red and green apples
AP: clear yellow, no head
F: warming feeling, Essenes of an apple, mix of green and red apple skins,

How: Bottle.
Where: From rlgk, thanks!
Appearance: Clear golden colour with no head.
Aroma: Apples, wood, some caramel.
Body: Medium to full body, no carbonation.
Flavour: Sweet apples, fruit, vanilla, some alcohol.
Bottle shared by bursprak. Taste is clear yellow. Aromas of sweet apples and vanilla. Taste is sweet, light tartness, grapey notes, tannins, vanilla. Huge apple bomb.

Bottle thanks to Bursprak. Pours clear golden. Aroma of sweet apples, green grapes, vanilla, sweet pear and sweet vinous notes. Taste of sweet apples, vanilla, oak, slight vinous, pear and an oily body. I mean Cmooon this is awesome!

From bottle at Dangerously pathetic repayshare. Pours a clear golden apple juice. Aroma has sweet intense red apples, light alcohol, light oak, but man this is all sweet apples. Light green apple acidity as well. Taste is super sweet, medium acidic, dry oak, oily, intensely fruity. Oily texture. Very simple and elegant, but shit this tastes good! Best ice cider ive had.
Bottle @ Dangerous Bottleshares pathetic repay share. Still copper pour. Notes of sweet red apples, light vanilla, apple skin, some white graves, dry , sweet, syrupy and some more apples.

Perfect clear golden/amber color, no head. Aromas of sweet apples, apple sauce and vanilla with some tart undertones. Very (!) sweet taste of apples, vanilla, cognac, with vinous, almost citruslike qualities that leads to a slight tart and alcoholic finish. Really cool!
Hand bottled from Victor, thanks! Golden color. Dried apples, oak, vanilla in the aroma. Sweet dried apple flavor with hints of oak and vanilla. No carbon. A soft sourness. Liquorish. Magnificent!

September 4, 2016. Bottle from Systembolaget. 
Clear golden leaving some oily legs on the glass. Aroma is fruity with baked apples, apple skin, pineapple, grape skins, sultanas, hints of toffee, vanilla and sherry. Taste is tart, sweet and fruity. Finish is tart green apple, a touch of lemon, some light dry grapey white wine character with a touch of oak, sweet fleshy apples, some toffee and sultanas. Medium to full bodied, oily texture. 
Great, more dried fruits than the original and the barrels adds a light winey and grapey character with a slightly drier finish.

A: Clear golden coloured, no head. N: Deep red apples, light oak, hint of grapes. T: Red apples, pear, grapefruit, grapes. O: Very deep and complex flavours from the barrels! Pairs very well with the ice cider. Truly adds another dimension to it! Lovely!

UPDATED: AUG 26, 2016 Bottle. Clear deep golden liquid that sticks to the glass. Aroma of raisin, vanilla, red apples, light wood, pear and peach. Taste is medium to high sweet with notes of winter apples, peach, rosehip and light wood. Full bodied with slick mouthfeel. Fantastic palate. So smooth. Beautiful stuff. The wood gives it a harsher, but more complex profile. I love this.

Bottle from Systembolaget. Clear deep golden color. Great fresh overripe apple aroma, woody, caramel, raisins, grapes, zesty notes, vanilla, apple must. Great apple flavor, raisins, zesty, vanilla, red grapes, warming alcohol, apple must. Nice body, perfect sipper.

Bottle bought @ Systembolaget. Pours clear deep golden / pale amber leaving some clearly seen legs on the glass with a swirl. Smell is heavy fruity with concentrated winter apple must, caramel, vanilla fudge, white raisins, honey, sherry, wood and hints of citrus peal. Taste is sweet, slightly sour and fruity. Mouthfeel is tiny viscous, oily, slightly tart, slightly sticky, tiny astringent, slightly boozy and medium bodied. Finish is sweet and slightly sour with sweet full flavoured apples, caramel, vanilla, white raisins, sherry, minerals and hints of orange peal and alcohol. Tiny bit hot perhaps but overall a beautiful ice cider with lovely white raisin oxidation and vanilla fudge barrel presence. Integrated and oily. Slight pity that most of the tropical fruit character from the base is gone but the raisin and winter apple replacement is lovely. Will be exciting to see how it develops.
